entries.journal_entry_description: Some Skaak Tippers are planning to steal all of the bank terminals from Kaadara and then attempt to hack into them. To stop them before they can strike, Colonel Panaka wants you to assault their hideout.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Go to the Skaak Tipper hideout and teach them to leave Kaadara alone. Or at least have second thoughts before attempting anything in the future.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Defeat Skaak Tippers at the Island Hideout
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: As a final blow to the Skaak Tipper gang, defeat their leader, Jonni Skaak. You should find him somewhere within the island hideout.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Good work! I knew you'd be a great fit for the RSF. I've always had an eye for your kind of talent. Report back to me, and we'll wrap up this assignment.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Report your success to Colonel Panaka.
